job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong><u>NO CTC</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Job Description </u></strong></p><ul><li>Critically assess and challenge models on conceptual soundness, assumptions and limitations, data, developmental evidence in support of modeling choices, performance, implementation and documentation</li><li>Understand the core methodology in AI solutions and the context in which it will be deployed so as to find risks/gaps</li><li>Develop efficient methodologies to detect and to quantify risks/gaps in AI solutions</li><li>Suggest alternative approaches or controls to mitigate risks/gaps identified</li><li>Develop and implement testing plans and testing code in order to challenge models through empirical analyses and to verify model implementation</li><li>Create metrics to quantify risks/gaps specific to each AI solution and define thresholds after consulting with all stakeholders</li><li>Monitor metrics for breach of thresholds</li><li>Look for unexpected risks / unintended consequences of an AI solution over its life cycle</li><li>Assist in evaluating AI Solutions during Tollgate, Risk Assessment &amp; Deployment Signoff process</li><li>Write technical reports for distribution and presentation to model developers, senior management, and audit</li></ul><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Ph.D/Masters/Bachelors degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Physics, Finance, Engineering or Statistics</li><li>6+ years of professional experience as a Data Scientist or related roles</li><li>Hands-on experience with Statistical Modeling/Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques is must</li><li>Should be well-versed in programming languages of R/Python/SAS and be familiar with Deep Learning Frameworks like Tensorflow/Pytorch</li><li>Sound knowledge of financial instruments and financial risk/operational risk management principles is must</li><li>Ability to understand and implement techniques discussed in AI research papers (academic and technical)</li><li>Candidates must have any of financial certifications like CFA, FRM</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Top 3 required IT/Technical skill-sets:</strong></p><ul><li>Hands-on experience with Statistical Modeling/Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques is must</li><li>Should be well-versed in programming languages of R/Python/SAS and be familiar with Deep Learning Frameworks like Tensorflow/Pytorch</li><li>Sound knowledge of financial instruments and financial risk/operational risk management principles is must</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>******REMOTE UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE*******</p>
